meaningMnemonic: We got <kanji>life</kanji> by <kanji>sending back</kanji> our runner to home plate. That run allowed us more life in this game. Now, maybe we'll win! It was all by <vocabulary>reaching home plate</vocabulary>. Outside of baseball, this means <vocabulary>returning alive</vocabulary> from somewhere.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
